seo_title: DataFlow Pro - Advanced Data Pipeline Management Tool
seo_description: Streamline your data workflows with DataFlow Pro. Build, monitor, and optimize data pipelines with ease.
name: DataFlow Pro
description: DataFlow Pro is a comprehensive data pipeline management platform that simplifies the process of building, deploying, and monitoring complex data workflows. Perfect for data engineers and teams looking to streamline their ETL processes.
troubleshooting_instructions: Ensure Docker is installed and running before starting
Check network connectivity if connectors fail to initialize
Verify API credentials are correctly configured in settings
installation_instructions:
npm install -g dataflow-pro
dataflow init
dataflow start
usage_instructions: Run 'dataflow init' to create a new project
Use the visual builder at http://localhost:8080 to design your pipeline
Configure data sources and destinations through the connectors menu
Deploy your pipeline with 'dataflow deploy production'
Monitor pipeline health in the dashboard

faqs.question: What data sources does DataFlow Pro support?
faqs.answer: DataFlow Pro supports 50+ data sources including PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, S3, Kafka, and all major cloud providers.

faqs.question: Can I run DataFlow Pro on-premise?
faqs.answer: Yes, DataFlow Pro can be deployed both on-premise and in the cloud. We provide Docker images and Kubernetes manifests for easy deployment.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required.

seo_title: CodeAssist AI - Intelligent Code Completion Assistant
seo_description: Boost your coding productivity with AI-powered code suggestions and intelligent auto-completion.
name: CodeAssist AI
description: CodeAssist AI leverages advanced machine learning to provide intelligent code suggestions, helping developers write better code faster.
installation_instructions:
Install from Chrome Web Store or VS Code marketplace:
code --install-extension codeassist-ai
usage_instructions: Install the extension in your preferred IDE
Sign in with your CodeAssist account
Start coding and see suggestions appear automatically
Use Tab to accept suggestions or Esc to dismiss

faqs.question: Which programming languages are supported?
faqs.answer: CodeAssist AI supports 25+ languages including JavaScript, Python, Java, C++, Go, Rust, and more.

faqs.question: Does it work offline?
faqs.answer: Basic features work offline, but AI suggestions require an internet connection.

name: CloudSync Pro
description: Synchronize files across multiple cloud storage providers with enterprise-grade security and reliability.
installation_instructions: Download installer from website and follow setup wizard
